instruction: Discuss the possible reasons why some firms have sustained competitive advantages over long periods of time.
output: One possible reason for this phenomenon could be the durable business models and sustained competitive advantages of high-quality firms. These firms are likely to have well-established strategies and products that have proven success over time, allowing them to maintain their position in the market. Additionally, these firms may also have strong brand recognition, customer loyalty, and skilled employees that contribute to their sustained success. In our sample, we found that high-quality firms tended to remain high-quality over both long periods and short-term difficult ones, further supporting this idea.
